not_found_message: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.
error_auth_desc: Your session has expired or you need to log in to view this page.
error_access_desc: You do not have the necessary permissions to view this resource.
error_network_desc: It looks like you're offline. Please check your internet connection.
error_server_desc: Our internal systems are having trouble. We've been notified.
error_unexpected_desc: An unknown error occurred. We're looking into it.
